El Diablo

cocktail
tequila
ginger beer

Ingredients

  • 1 1/2 oz repesado tequila
  • 1/2 oz creme de cassis
  • 1/2 oz lime juice
  • 2 oz ginger beer

Procedure

  1. Pour tequila, creme de cassis, and lime juice into a shaker with ice
  2. Shake until chilled
  3. Strain into glass with fresh ice
  4. Top with ginger beer, stir gently to combine
  5. Optional garnish with lime wedge
